unnormalised: Exam Prep Apps: Your Secret Weapon This Exam Season!
normalised: Exam Prep Apps: Your Secret Weapon This Exam Season!

unnormalised: Hey students, feeling the pressure of upcoming exams? Chill! EdTech is here to help. Exam prep apps are booming, and they're becoming the go-to study buddies for students from Chennai to Chandigarh.
normalised: Hey students, feeling the pressure of upcoming exams? Chill! EdTech is here to help. Exam prep apps are booming, and they're becoming the go to study buddies for students from Chennai to Chandigarh.

unnormalised: Forget rote learning! These apps offer interactive lessons, personalized mock tests, and even gamified quizzes. Think flashcards that actually make learning fun!
normalised: Forget rote learning! These apps offer interactive lessons, personalized mock tests, and even gamified quizzes. Think flashcards that actually make learning fun!

unnormalised: We spoke to Priya Sharma, a JEE aspirant in Kota, who swears by "ExamZenith," saying it helped her understand complex physics concepts easily.
normalised: We spoke to Priya Sharma, a J E E aspirant in Kota, who swears by "ExamZenith," saying it helped her understand complex physics concepts easily.

unnormalised: Many apps also offer practice papers based on the latest CBSE and state board syllabuses. And get this: some even have doubt-clearing sessions with expert teachers. So, no more staying up all night stressing over tough problems!
normalised: Many apps also offer practice papers based on the latest C B S E and state board syllabuses. And get this: some even have doubt clearing sessions with expert teachers. So, no more staying up all night stressing over tough problems!

unnormalised: This Onam season, treat yourself to some biryani and guilt-free study sessions using these cool apps. Apps like "StudyMantra" and "ScoreHigh" promise to boost your scores by at least 15%. So, download one today and ace those exams! Good luck from all of us!
normalised: This Onam season, treat yourself to some biryani and guilt free study sessions using these cool apps. Apps like "StudyMantra" and "ScoreHigh" promise to boost your scores by at least fifteen percent. So, download one today and ace those exams! Good luck from all of us!
